newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi beheads Filipino patient who killed surgeon.
newsitem.headline: Saudi beheads Filipino patient who killed surgeon.

text.p: Two murderers were beheaded in Saudi Arabia on Friday -- a Filipino man who stabbed to death his surgeon in the operating theatre and a Saudi who machinegunned a fellow national.

An interior ministry statement read on Saudi television said the Filipino repeatedly stabbed the surgeon with scissors in the operating room of a Riyadh hospital after being operated on. The statement gave no reason for the attack.
The surgeon was an Arab man who held Canadian citizenship.
The Saudi man was found guilty of shooting dead another Saudi national with a machinegun after a dispute.
Both men were beheaded in the capital Riyadh.
Thirty-eight people have been executed this year in Saudi Arabia which strictly enforces Islamic sharia law by beheading murderers, drug smugglers, rapists and other criminals.
